text: Question on Macros within our stylesheet. I added a few to the top of the main.css but tried referencing them in _menu.css and other included stylesheets and the macros are out of scope and not uploading in the CLI with this error:

If the macros are in `main.css` , files included in `main.css` have no way of knowing about them out of context. Youâ€™ll need to re-organize the code, possibly by importing macros in the individual files instead.

ah I understand...why doesnt this work?
`{% include './_menus.css' with context %}`
